001package com.github.sormuras.bach.project;
002
003import java.util.ArrayList;
004import java.util.Collection;
005import java.util.Collections;
006import java.util.List;
007import java.util.stream.Stream;
008
009/** A collection of folder types. */
010public record FolderTypes(Collection<FolderType> values) {
011
012  public static FolderTypes of(FolderType... values) {
013    return new FolderTypes(Stream.of(values).sorted().toList());
014  }
015
016  public FolderTypes add(FolderType type) {
017    if (values.contains(type)) return this;
018    var values = new ArrayList<>(this.values);
019    values.add(type);
020    Collections.sort(values);
021    return new FolderTypes(List.copyOf(values));
022  }
023}
